subject: RE: [junit] How to test Graphics and Events in  Swings?
msgSnippet: ... The way I understood Rajeev, he actually wants to write a tool like Abbot and unit test it. Is Abbot unit tested? How did you test that it generates the
messageBody:
Crutcher, John wrote:
> Abbot (a better bot) is designed to operate on the GUI. It
> has methods (for example ComponentTester.actionClick()) that
> does what you are looking for. It is open source ( found at
> http://abbot.sourceforge.net/ ). Take a look!

The way I understood Rajeev, he actually wants to write a tool like Abbot
and unit test it. Is Abbot unit tested? How did you test that it generates
the right events?

Cheers, Ilja
